name: /ossxroot/superScripts
body:
# **Complicated tasks made superSimple**

_**osxroot**_ is the deep dark coder side of **[mac007.com]**(http://www.mac007.com), an OS X Server consulting firm. In addition to scripts to simplify managing OS X, osxroot also offers step by step tutorials for the non technical do it yourselfer. 

_**superScripts**_ are mostly written for OS X 10.6 and higher. Some may only work on certain versions and we will notate these to the best of our ability. Please use, enjoy and feel free to contribute and improve them. We love seeing how other coders think.  


***
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
